text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He is a member of the House of Representatives. He was Minister for Foreign Affairs in the Prime Minister Shinzo Abe cabinet from 3 August 2017 until 11 September 2019. On 3 September 2021, Kono announced his candidacy for the Liberal Democratic Party leadership in the 2021 election. He lost the election to former Foreign Affairs Minister Fumio Kishida on 29 September. In August 2024, Kono announced his second candidacy for the Liberal Democratic leadership election to replace Prime Minister Fumio Kishida. He lost the election to former Defense Minister Shigeru Ishiba on 27 September 2024. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Japan Category:Defense ministers of Japan Category:Digital Transformation ministers of Japan
title: Taro Kono
